translation: 来自加里克·皮尔斯的信

original: Garrick Pierce sent you a letter. But the paper is torn in the middle. The contents read as such:\n“I hope you understand... I would've never contacted you unless I had no other choice. I know the truth behind McCoy's true parentage. And I'm aware of how vital this information is to you. As you know, my execution is scheduled for next month. And I'm running out of time. I want to trade this information with you. In exchange, you will grant me my freedom. Meet me within the private Prayer Room within the Grand Cathedral of the Scaled Lord at 2:00 PM. You will save me from my fate, or else”
translation: 加里克·皮尔斯给你寄了一封信。但信纸被从中间撕破了，内容如下：\n“我希望你理解……除非别无选择，我不会主动联系你。我知道麦考伊真正血统背后的事实了。我也知道这一信息对你多么重要。你也知道，我下个月就要被执行死刑了。留给我的时间不多了。我想和你做个交易，你要保我自由，下午两点，鳞甲领主大教堂的私人祷告室内见。你会把我从宿命中救出来的，不然”
